thread.title: Rupee tumbles 9 paise to 2-year low at Rs 65.40 against dollar
thread.title_full: Rupee tumbles 9 paise to 2-year low at Rs 65.40 against dollar

title: Rupee tumbles 9 paise to 2-year low at Rs 65.40 against dollar
text:
| Updated: Aug 19, 2015 10:31 IST 
The rupee weakened by 9 paise to trade at two-year low of Rs 65.40 against dollar at the Interbank Foreign Exchange market on Wed7as the US currency strengthened overseas. 
Forex dealers said apart from sustained demand for the US currency from importers and dollar's gain against other currencies overseas, lower opening in domestic equity markets put pressure on the rupee. 
The rupee had plummeted by 31 paise to end at two-year low of Rs 65.31 against the US dollar on Monday. Forex market was closed on Tuesday on account of Parsi New Year. 
Meanwhile, the benchmark BSE Sensex dropped by 110.29 points, or 0.39%, to 27,721.25. Tags
